content: I've been seeing all sorts of weird and exciting ICEs crop up during regular development. I couldn't, however, make a simple reproducer or figure out what was causing it; and cargo clean would typically resolve the ICE.
has anybody seen this and/or know whats this about?

I've seen it happen during normal development of binary, it cropped up maybe 3 times over last 2 days of normal development (which included, but not limited to, adding and removing crates, adding/removing/editing async functions etc)
Yeah, there have been a few new incr. comp. issues

nagisa said:

has anybody seen this and/or know whats this about?

Yeah, I started seeing this quite a lot recently when using cargo check.
Hopefully those will soon be fixed by #79721
